supahnickie.caffeine

Class CaffeinePooledConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • supahnickie.caffeine.CaffeinePooledConnection

  • public final class CaffeinePooledConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    CaffeinePooledConnection is a small utility class used mostly internally to generate a connection pool. However, some of the methods are public to allow a user to generate reusable PreparedStatements.
    See Also:
    README containing examples, including initialization

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Grabs the connection instance for a particular Pooled Connection.
      java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(java.lang.String sql)
      Method to allow users to generate a PreparedStatement on the PooledConnection object so they don't have to manage resources themselves.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • prepareStatement

        public java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(java.lang.String sql)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to allow users to generate a PreparedStatement on the PooledConnection object so they don't have to manage resources themselves.
        Parameters:
        sql - Raw sql to be executed, as with any normal PreparedStatement.
        Returns:
        PreparedStatement object that can be reused.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Grabs the connection instance for a particular Pooled Connection.
        Returns:
        Raw DB connection that will stay open and out of the connection pool until the user manually releases it.
